notes: The RCV_SHIPMENT_HEADERS table captures high-level metadata about inbound shipments, forming the header for grouped receipt transactions in Oracle EBS Receiving. It supports three-way matching (PO, Receipt, Invoice), receiving workflows for both external suppliers and internal orders, and integration with ASN (Advance Shipment Notice). Key columns include RECEIPT_NUM (used in UI), VENDOR_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, ASN_TYPE, and ASN_STATUS. For Internal Orders, ORGANIZATION_ID is populated. Intransit receipts don't get a receipt number until actual receipt is recorded.
